pullrequest.title: Get plugin info with Ignition transport service

content.raw:
Done dfc1fbe

Also changed the service to be `/physics/info/plugin`, so we can create other services for each library:

~~~
/sensors/info/plugin
/rendering/info/plugin
/gui/info/plugin
~~~

Come to think of it, we could even change it to be a more general `/<library>/info` service, which also returns entity info, for example. Then we deprecate the gazebo request which provides that currently. Thoughts?
content.html:
Done dfc1fbe

Also changed the service to be /physics/info/plugin, so we can create other services for each library:

/sensors/info/plugin
/rendering/info/plugin
/gui/info/plugin

Come to think of it, we could even change it to be a more general /<library>/info service, which also returns entity info, for example. Then we deprecate the gazebo request which provides that currently. Thoughts?
